alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 10:20PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Box Butte, northeastern Scotts Bluff, northwestern Morrill and southeastern Sioux Counties through 945 PM MDT... At 920 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Minatare, or 10 miles northeast of Scottsbluff, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kilpatrick Lake, Lake Minatare Campground, Lake Minatare and Lake Alice. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Cheyenne.
